website_summaries.verdict: A more affordable option for buyers wanting high-quality glass at a cheaper price point.
pros: Contemporary design offers a shorter and more rounded glass while still able to hold 15 ounces of wine
Shatter-resistant material great for guests and parties
cons: Some buyers had issues with the product arriving warped after shipping

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to stemmed wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: After knocking over and shattering the last of the stemmed wine glasses due to the usual clumsiness (and probably not helped by having drunk the wine in the glasses), we decided to try a different style. These are of a nice shape and size, hold about 15 ounces which means you can pour a decent portion of wine and not have to worry about it spilling off the top. Yeah, for cold wine, you don't get to hold the stem and not warm the contents; not a serious concern here - much of the wine we drink probably benefits from an ice cube in it. No problems at all with the order - glasses arrived on time and packed well.
customer_reviews.author: WhichWayIsLeft

customer_reviews.title: As good as they look! Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are easy to hold in your hand, good weight, easy to clean and are elegant in their design. We ordered them for use in our Maine Summer Camp and they are just perfect. I’m glad we chose these stemless glasses. Quick shipping and well packaged.👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Char M.

customer_reviews.title: Good look - Good feel
customer_reviews.text: The glasses arrive on time and without damage. They are comfortable to hold (middle age woman) and I enjoy using them when drinking wine. They probably could be used nicely for mixed drinks as well.I purchased these glasses rather some others available because they did not appear to have a heavy bottom. I was correct. They have a more elegant look and feel than the heavier style but do not appear fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Grovite

customer_reviews.title: stylish wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift - recipient liked the style and has used it for more than wine (juice). They arrived unscathed during the post Black Friday delivery season. They have been hand-washed. So I don't know how they will fare in a dishwasher. The glass itself is just a shade thinner than some of the glassware this recipient has. So the glasses should easily survive a dishwasher. I will update once this has been done.
customer_reviews.author: roundrocker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: After years of buying wine glasses with stems, I decided to get with modern times and try something different. I’m glad I did. These wine glasses are elegant yet very sturdy. With animals in my household, these have proven to be a safer choice as well. These wine glasses are a great value, were packaged with care and had speedy delivery time. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine L. Crossmon

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses; Quick Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery; great product! These stemless wine glasses have a slightly shorter, slightly wider profile than other stemless wine glasses. The glasses are elegant to the eye and have a terrific hand-feel. I predict that the these glasses soon will be considered the best in class. In addition to being excellent wine glasses, they're perfect for vodka or whiskey on the rocks. These are the best glasses I've ever owned. I plan to purchase another half-dozen soon.
customer_reviews.author: Denman

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these as they could potentially be dangerous around children
customer_reviews.text: All of our glasses broke within the first two weeks. We don’t have a dishwasher so we were carefully washing them all by hand. The glass is very thin... one broke applying normal pressure with a sponge during washing and two cracked/broke dropping ice cubes inside. I would not recommend these as they could potentially be dangerous around children. They were also inconsistent and irregular in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality glass
customer_reviews.text: The seller was awesome as far as replacing these foggy wine glasses. HOWEVER the new set they sent was even WORSE than the first set. NO AMOUNT OF SCRUBBING NOR THE DISHWASHER could get them clear. Other reviews have reflected my comments. I would not advise anyone to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: buddyincarlsbad

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love how they look, they feel sturdy, and for the price, first time buying a stemless and loving it
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Use for whites not reds. Read the dimensions and measure out what they tell you.
customer_reviews.text: It is imperative to measure the bowl so you know what you are getting regardless of the description given. These do not have a wide bowl at the top. They are very light weight and do not feel like quality as opposed to the 19 oz. bowls. They are fine for casual dining. I would not drink red from these as the mouth of the bowl is only 2.75”. I think they are ok for casual get togethers though it’s the hyped advertisement that I did not like.
customer_reviews.author: 3c

customer_reviews.title: Good glass for good wine
customer_reviews.text: My wife is the wine drinker and she is loving these. Easy to use, less risk of knocking it over and wasting the wine, and she says concentrates the fumes for the nose. Wine people, right! Great glasses at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Shatter dramatically
customer_reviews.text: Revised review I gave these inexpensive but attractive glasses 5 stars, but am resubmitting a lower review because I just had one break and have never seen glassware break into so many tiny shards with such a range.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Starcevich

customer_reviews.title: Shatters just like glass!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in a Florida beach apartment that has ceramic tile floors throughout. Since I spend a lot of time barefoot in the apartment, I didn't want to use glass stemware that would shatter if dropped. Imagine my surprise to open the box and find that one of the glasses shattered in shipping just as if it was glass. So what's the point of using these if they're going to break just like glass?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. GrvThang

customer_reviews.title: They're wiiiiiide.
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, these made-in-China glasses seem to have a lot of variation in thickness and quality. Mine were thicker at the lip than I prefer, and are almost uncomfortably wide at the base, making them hard to hold (and I'm an average-sized man). However, that also makes them less prone to tipping, a plus. At the price point they're being sold for, I wouldn't have expected much, and didn't get it. Overall, maybe a solid B-minus. These will probably become my patio/outdoor/picnic glasses and will work well for that purpose. But if you're looking for higher quality non-stemware :) look at something a little pricier.
customer_reviews.author: JD Ruggero

customer_reviews.title: Wine for klutzes
customer_reviews.text: I tend to knock things over. While I still will be able to destroy a white linen table cloth with these glasses loaded with red wine, it's that much harder to do. Wide sweeping gestures at table while discoursing on politics--have to alter them to be lower towards my plate and not up in the air, where I typically knock over the crystal stemware. They do hold plenty of wine. One of mine showed up broken in the package. Big box, box inside, bubble wrap and still it was shattered. I presume it was shattered before packing. Take care in unpacking, you may have another surprise that can injure you, especially if you are klutzy like me.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna D.

customer_reviews.title: Shatter-resistant as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have knocked several of these off of my counter several times and they have yet to even crack. I was initially concerned about the shatter-resistant claim because of how thin they were, but they have held up incredibly well. The only reason I am not giving this 5 stars is because of an issue with quality control. A couple of glasses in my set have a small bead or droplet of glass that hardened on the rim which can just look a little unappealing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffkr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy , great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: First, I want to say I never write reviews. Like ever. And I certainly never change them. But I’m this case it’s necessary. JoyJolt is a solid company that definitely appears to care about the happiness of their customers. Thank you for the amazing customer service and replacement glass. It’s perfectly balanced. Honestly, based on the overall quality, the wobbly one was probably a fluke. I would definitely purchase from this company again. In general these glasses are nice. Not too thin, good size, good price. My only issue is that one glass is not flat on the bottom. A flat bottom is kind of an important feature in a glass. Three stars because of the unusable glass.
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Your friends may swoon over your heirloom cystal, but do you really want to put at risk for a casual cocktail party or outdoor gathering. These glasses are attractive, hold a good measuure of wine, are stemless, and just plain glass. The lack of a stem means it's easier to set down without tipping or spilling. And if it does get dropped, they're inexpensive enough, they're easily replaced. Who knows? They might even work for geer!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly Lady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stemless ware
customer_reviews.text: My husband is not allowed in our house to use the stemware, as somehow he's set a glass down at an odd angle and they go crashing onto the floor and break. He had some plastic wine cups, but they looked terrible. I was doing a bit of shopping during Prime days and saw these cute wine glasses and purchased them for him. The are great. Beautiful and a wonderful shape, perfect for red or white wine. He's super excited and loves the way they feel in his hand, sturdy is hoe he describes them!
customer_reviews.author: Celine C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something special for my daughter. She is moving out into her first apartment. She has always preferred the stemless wine glasses. These are perfect size and fit comfortable in your hand. No worry about breaking the stem in the dishwasher either. They appear to be made of sturdy glass. I am pretty pleased with the quality and simplistic style. It will fit in with everything she already has.
customer_reviews.author: PoolFixer

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING!
customer_reviews.text: This product was used and smells and has several marks on the glasses! Seriously, Amazon needs to get better! This is the 3rd product this year that was top rated but total trash when I got it. I'm sticking to Target. I'm onky using Amazon if I absolutely need to. What a joke! Buyer BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and quality
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I thought I was ordering unbreakable acrylic glasses and must have scooted over to the real glass ones but, since I had broken a couple of stemless glasses that I had before, I don't mind. I'll just have to be on the hunt again. Meanwhile, the glasses have a great heft and they are quite lovely. Know we will be using them and I'll just get others that are unbreakable for our travels.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A lovely purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After having Airbnb guests use wine glasses that I asked them not to leave on the shelf, I decided to set out some wine glasses they COULD use! I figured that glasses with stems were more likely to be knocked over, so bought these and am really happy with my purchase. These wine glasses are nicely made and easy to hold. I think my guests will be as pleased with them as I am!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Check the rims!
customer_reviews.text: These stemless glasses feel great and look sparkly. I ordered them for a special Valentines party. I inboxed and washed them and was pleased until I was putting them away. Sadly, two of four have bubbley rims. Definitely noticible. They will work fine but the uneven rim will be uncomfortable to the mouth...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses because stemmed wine glasses kept getting knocked over and broken. These are very nice to hold, and while not fancy, are very nice looking. They arrived in perfect condition. I didn't rate durability because I've only had them a couple of days. But they feel like glass that would not break as easily as many of our other wine glasses. I'm very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the feel of them compared to other glasses I have. And one slipped out my hand and hit the table and shattered to smithereens! I have a powerful vacuum and it still took two good vacuums to get all the shards of class out of my carpet, which does not have a high pile. I’ve gotten better wine glasses from Ross, for way less. Not a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ponscella L. Cousins

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS. DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while back and have been adding decals and gifting to friends. HAD MY FIRST ORDER of these and i went to go wash it before applying decal and i turned the water on and sprayed some dawn spray dish soap and took my hand and wiped inside and a piece of glass lifted and i sliced my index finger. Im still in pain from the burning of the cut. DO NOT BUY. SO DANGEROUS .
customer_reviews.author: A.C

customer_reviews.title: BECARFUL - GLASS SHATTERS?
customer_reviews.text: This is not a safe item. I had made coffee with this and put a few ice cubes; the differential temp was enough to shatter the glass. Its waayyy too thin and shatters easily. The other ones completely shatter as well with small jolts. warning do not buy this product unless you want risk getting injured. This product should be removed due to hazardous.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for Seniors with Trembles
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these glasses, after dropping one (smash) I ordered another set. The originals are several years old and I do like my daily wine with dinner. I'm 88 and my friends are near my age, some with shaky hands, so I'm preparing ahead for the next drop. Much easier to clean up than my crystal glasses that I don't use any more due to breaking one of those, and they shatter into a million pieces and it seems to take months to find them all!
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Alt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect & Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this price! Given the bargain, I thought the quality would be lacking but I was pleasantly surprised to find out they still look really nice! At this price point you’re not going to get a super thin rim, but it isn’t wildly thick either. I was looking for a great set of everyday type wine glasses and that’s exactly what these are. I also like that they are a little shorter and more wide than other stemless glasses so that they have a unique look. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Emily P

customer_reviews.title: No stem yet just as elegant as a regular wine glass
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent and it feels great in my hand not, not flimsy. I love that they are stemless. Sometimes I want to have a glass of wine while working at my laptop desk. A glass with a stem would be in a precarious position, but not this glass. You can put it down with the confidence that it will stay put. Will definitely purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: These are rather ungracefully heavy, especially at the lip ...
customer_reviews.text: These are rather ungracefully heavy, especially at the lip. I think a sharper taper at the lip is more elegant. But consider the price. (At my purchase price), these aren't placed to be considered high-end.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Price, LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these stemless wineglasses for a dinner reception and I'm extremely satisfied. They arrived well packaged and are exactly as described. You can see right away that these are high quality and have a crystal-like feel. I found these glasses to have a wide bottom which allows the glass to rest steady and allow the wine to breath nicely. Overall, a terrific product at a great price (it's a set of 4!) and I already bought another 2 sets as holiday gifts for a friend and family member! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Two of these have been cracked just from simply hand washing them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric

customer_reviews.title: Feel Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are nice in that they hold liquid, but if you are expecting something better than the $1.00 glasses you can buy at your local big box store, you will be sorely disappointed. The glass is thin and they are quite unimpressive. I will use them for myself, but I would not use them if I was looking to impress company.
customer_reviews.author: Corwin Aeon

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this purchase. They are what they are....wine glasses without stems (we decided to buy some after my husband knocked over his stemmed wine glass, spilling wine on the Christmas cards we had just done....not to mention the time my cat knocked over my glass onto the keyboard of my six month old MacBook!). We're hoping these help prevent these catastrophes. They are medium weight; are great for the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Stemware
customer_reviews.text: I love to drink wine but hate to deal with stemmed wine glasses: they are easy to knock over and difficult to place in the dishwasher. These stemless wine glasses hold a generous amount and fit easily in the hand. I haven't had occasion to test their endurance but they feel sturdy. This set of 4 is perfect for my husband and I and would make a great gift since they come in an attractive box.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Too thin to use
customer_reviews.text: The look and style of the glasses are appealing, the thickness of the glass is so thin that using them becomes risky. The bottom of the glass does not have enough weight to confidently keep them stable, risking accidentally tipping them over while reaching for or setting down the glass. Filled with red wine, this could pose a real problem. I'm returning them and looking for something a bit more "substantial" in terms of strength/overall weight.
customer_reviews.author: LZ Reader

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cat antics at bay!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of cats that have recently discovered the joys of gravity...particularly when it comes to pushing my stemmed glasses off of tables. I was looking for a solution that would both allow me to have my water or wine untouched by their curious noses, and keep them from being able to push the glasses around. These little glasses are perfect! They're sturdy, hold more liquid than they look like they would, and the tapered top keeps prying kitty faces out. Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Litow

customer_reviews.title: No Whining With Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: We realized when we were setting the table for Easter that we only had 3 stemless wine glasses. Immediately, we went on Amazon, looked at some glasses and read the reviews. We chose JoyJolt Spirits Stemless Wine Glasses and couldn't be happier. We got them the day before Easter and were able to enjoy the glasses. Great price and good glasses.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 glasses cracked after washing within a month of use. The first one cracked after washing in a dishwasher (on the top shelf). It was a very peculiar break -- a rim (about an inch long) split from the rest of the glass. I thought these glasses were not strong enough for a dishwasher normal wash cycle, so I switched to hand washing them. Strangely enough, two more glasses developed similar cracks (not during the actual washing) while they were left to dry. I bought these based on the glorious reviews. But it is safe to say that I have never seen worse quality glasses. Hence the low rating!
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use of drinking wine in our bedroom. Typical stem glasses are too top heavy and invite disaster of spilled wine. The "tulip" shape of these glasses preserves the important practicality of concentrating the fragrances of the wine and maintain a lower center of gravity minimizing the chances of undesired spills.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gerald Beane

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet durable
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I had a similar set for over 6 years and when I was drying them recently a few shattered. I wanted to make sure we had a matching set so I ordered these. We've had them about a month and they are really nice. Very similar to our old set which we loved and seem durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, functional, nice to look at
customer_reviews.text: These stemless wine glasses are perfect for my needs: simply designed and nice to look at, they also cannot be knocked over. I have broken too many wine glasses over the years, which is the main reason for this purchase. Glass tumblers would be functional, but these are a level up because they are so pretty. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: planetgrrl

customer_reviews.title: 75% fine drinking, 25% glass burrs
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are O.K. They look nice from a distance. Up close, the rim all have an super-thick spot that's pretty obvious. I would have rated these higher, but one of the four had sharp bits sticking out of the thick spot. That glass was unusable as it would have cut someone's lip. Wasn't worth it to use to return the set for 1 glass, so we just chucked out the bad one and kept the rest. Would have rated a 4 at least were it not for the poor quality controls.
customer_reviews.author: En La

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great at the price we are paying for them. They seem to be made of sufficiently thick glass, so as not to break with the slightest touch. At least it has happened with mine. They don't wobble. Perfect for intimate dinner parties. The owner sent me a fresh box of glasses after I had minor issues with the ones I received at first. They are a small business and I would recommend these glasses if you are looking for quality product at a reasonable price. The owner if this reaches you, thank you for the second batch of glasses and I would gladly recommend your product to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with these stemless wine glasses! I've noticed better aroma and tasting experience with these, it really does matter on the glass you use. I was a little concerned because they seemed a little thin however I haven't broken one yet and they have gotten a lot of use (lol). I recommended these to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Timian

customer_reviews.title: Rounder than I expected
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, and practical for casual use. I thought it was more 'globular' and round than I had expected. I own similar 'stemless' glasses in the plastic variety, which are thinner and also more slender. I feel that shape is more versatile. Otherwise, this is a great product with good value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are very beautiful glasses for the money. They look and feel very expensive. Often glasses can feel very clunky and heavy; these are light but very durable. I am very tough on my glassware, so the fact that I've had them for months and haven't broken one yet is a testament to their durability!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by the quality
customer_reviews.text: The glass is thicker than I thought it would be which I’m incredibly happy about! We ordered this set since we were drinking wine out of cups like heathens for a while and I didn’t care to spend a ridiculous amount of money. I was expecting something that would be a lot more delicate and fragile that could tip over easily but they are quite the opposite. They are overall really good quality glasses and they look really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a smaller size, about 6 ounces or so as described on Amazon. I got large ones, 15 oz or so. They are lovely, appear to be good quality, and I will use them. But if you do make small ones, I would like to order some. Please let me know, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually haven’t used them yet, I did take them out of the box last night. But they are perfect for what I need. Girls night, whatever. I have the tendency to break the ones with stems so, I was encouraged to buy the stemless ones. Very excited to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Furgerson

customer_reviews.title: A bit lighter than I'd hoped, but still very nice in the hand
customer_reviews.text: These are stable on the table, as I'd hoped. They've a bit lighter-weight than I'd hoped--certainly not a juice tumbler or a proper Scotch glass--but they're attractive, nicely made, and a pleasure to hold for a nice glass of wine. I'm quite happy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bier

customer_reviews.title: Stemless JoyJolt wine glasses.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wine glass I need because I keep spilling red wine in my living room. I really like the thickness of the glass, as these will not be so fragile but make a perfect wine glass that is not “tippy.” These should be great!
customer_reviews.author: Duffylou

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. I bought these on a whim because I had no glasses and I love them. They are so much easier to hold than the stemmed glasses. They have been cleaning up well on the top shelf in my dishwasher. I will absolutely consider these as gifts to people in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought these for my husband who has a slight tremor. He dropped it in the sink while he was washing it—just a few inches—and it shattered. The second one was on a low table and slipped off when he jostled the table standing up. The glass landed on a rug and shattered. I believe that “shatter resistant” is an inaccurate description. We would send the other two back, but the packaging has gone in the trash. Never dreamed they would be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaWoman

customer_reviews.title: Imperfections on lip and spell like dish soap?
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed when I opened these was the strong smell of dish soap as if they were previously used and washed before being packed up. I'm not sure if this is the case, but the package wasn't secured with tape of any kind. The second thing is that all of the glasses have bumps and imperfections on the lip. Really low quality workmanship. The only reason I didn't give 1 star is because I can still drink out of them...after a long cycle in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gair

customer_reviews.title: cloudy appearance
customer_reviews.text: overall not impressed with these glasses. although they seem to be sturdy and easy to handle, they are very cloudy so the glasses look dirty all the time. i thought maybe they just had a film on them when i received them but after a hand washing as well as a cycle thru the dishwasher they still have the cloudy appearance. i am getting rid of them and will get some clear glass.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Found defects, but good for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy these for wine, but for everyday use. The rims are not thin, but several of the 8 glasses I purchased had a "bubble" on the rim, and one had a chip in the bubble. I tossed the chipped one, but I'll use the rest for everyday beverages. Other than the flaws, I think these are the quality of the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: R.M. Florida

customer_reviews.title: Lovely quality - perfect for "overly exuberant" imbibers
customer_reviews.text: As someone whose hand gestures become proportionately exuberant to the number of glasses of Pinot Noir, these stemless classic beauties are the perfect solution for eliminating the tabletop bowling ball down the alley kind of skids and crashes that stemmed glasses present for me. Elegant, yet sturdy. I should know.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and very good quality and not thin feeling. No stickers on the bottom of the glasses either. Not cheap looking. This would be a nice gift to give as well. 15 oz. Boxed very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight wine glass.
customer_reviews.text: Wine glasses arrived intact and as described. Nice feel in the hand. I hand washed them and they have a nice weight and smooth top edge. Have not used for wine drinking yet but expect the glass to be perfect. Plan to buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these glasses (they're perfect and we're a family that's picky about our wines!). As a result, I'm going to order more for my daughter, who just moved into her new apartment! Thank you, JoyJolt, for being a company that I will rely on and, most importantly, trust for future purchases. Count on it, there will be more of those! 🙏 deborah
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Love the stemless wine glasses from JoyJolt
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was wanting a set of basic stemless wine glasses and saw that JoyJolt offered these so I ordered them. I have had a pair of JoyJolt espresso cups for about a year now and love them so was glad to see these. I think they are glass because they look and feel like glass, but they seem more durable than regular glass. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jay S

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, solid glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses arrived well-packed with no breakage. They are made of extremely high quality glass- solid, easy to hold, and able to withstand a lot of use. These are a bargain at this price- they look just like the ones at other retailers that cost twice as much. I will enjoy these for years to come. Don't hesitate on these.
customer_reviews.author: JanieO

customer_reviews.title: Great shape, great size.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Like weight, thin glass. You have to remember that these are stemless wine goblets so the thin glass comes with the territory. They also work well for a nice rum cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Twee

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality (revised)
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt even feel like glass, its so thick that it feels like plastic in my hands and the glass is not evenly cut so the rim looks a little awkward. Edit: The owner sent me replacements and they are much better this time, it is a set of proper wine glasses with flat rims. Thank you very much Mike!
customer_reviews.author: Kerem Yildirim

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: JoyJolt Spirits Stemless Wine Glasses Bought these for my husband. He dropped one on the kitchen floor and rolled around but did not break. They are a very nice size and shape, too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: glasses are perfect and wrapped well
customer_reviews.text: these were a gift for my sister as she had no wine glasses and she liked my stemless glasses. they came and she loves them and was impressed in how well they were wrapped in bubblewrap. "Quite Impressive packaging" was her quote. she loves them. good size, easy to hold. another thing she likes. If you fill them with wine and drink it.. you catch a buzz :)
customer_reviews.author: billyd

customer_reviews.title: cheap but effective
customer_reviews.text: pretty cheap feeling but easy to hold, dont feel fragile and dont feel too much like cheap plastic either. NOT a fine dining glass though...I feel comfortable taking these out on the balcony/patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was getting plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some durable plastic, stemless wine glasses for use outside this summer. What arrived were beautiful, sturdy glass stemless wine glasses. They are easy to hold and while not what I expected, they seem like they would be easy to pack up and take on a picnic or use on the back deck. A pleasant, elegant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brooke Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ok for an inexpensive wine glass
customer_reviews.text: They are fine for an inexpensive wine glass for yourself at home. Nothing special. But the thickness of the bottom is much more substantial than the rim. It tipped over lightly in the sink, and shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Sam in San Jose

customer_reviews.title: Simple and nice
customer_reviews.text: The glass set is very handy. It is light weight. If taken proper care, these will last you a while. I have been using it on a regular basis and have found no issues with it. It got delivered in great condition. I recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Shalav Awale

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Great stemless wine glasses with good weight and size. These are exactly as pictured, with a nice ball bottom shape and are good quality. Pleased with the purchase and recommend to others. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond In The Ruff Lhasas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really love these glasses. I find they are light weight but not super thin glass. the super thin glass busts so easily that I don't like to purchase it. These glasses work well for wine, but also for juices, flavored water, etc. One of mine in the set of 4 was broken on arrival and the JoyJolt company sent me a replacement in a matter of days. I am thoroughly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Amazon's search engine sucks
customer_reviews.text: These seen to be well made wine glasses. I am returning them since they are not what I want. They show up as the top hit for plastic stemless wine glasses but are made of glass . Not at all what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stemless wine glass - more stable
customer_reviews.text: They work fine! These are a slightly different shape & design comparing to our stemless wine glasses from Kohls. As with any wine glass, be careful stacking them in the dishwasher. Sometimes a water glass or mug could crush a wine glass while loading or washing. Or ... sometimes I could be more careful.
customer_reviews.author: technobuff19

customer_reviews.title: Loving The Joy Jolt Spirits Stemless Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the Joy Jolt Spirits Stemless Wine Glasses. it is much safer and stronger than the stemmed wine glasses. I am not sure why it took me so long to make this purchase. I Love It.
customer_reviews.author: divalady

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, recomendable
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am updating my review due to the customer service experience I had with this purchase. At first I wasn’t very impressed and bought them thinking they were like any other glass and any other company but I actually had a great experience, they show they really care for their products and their customers happiness. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A.23

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I like stemless wine glasses because they are both attractive, feel good in my hand and easier to manage and not break than wine glasses with stems. They are packaged very well, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Bump and sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: Glad these aren't a gift 2 of my glasses have a bump and 1 has a sharp point on the side of bump. I won't be able to drink from the 1. The product description page states no bumps and call us if not satisfied yet I can't find anyway to contact them. No email no number to call.
customer_reviews.author: sky15425

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these wine glasses. I like the size and the shape. They seem to be durable but at the same time elegant. I would definitely recommend them. Also, they arrived well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Doggie Moms

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this glassware!
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 4 glasses wobble when set down. 1 doesn't, but it feels like I've spent quite a bit of money for a single wine glass that isn't fine chrystal, just a very heavy glass. There's some kind of adage about buying cheap and having to buy twice, something like that. In any case, I'll just not try to go cheap and I'll get some higher quality wineglasses. I'd never use these to serve to friends. Maybe I'll just buy some Bettas and use them as tiny aquariums?
customer_reviews.author: Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Good glasses for a great price. We were hosting a party and needed more real wine glasses so we looked like high-functioning adults. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for more wine glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I've got a picnic to go on and felt that stemless wine glasses would be a better choice, so I chose these. They seem to be good quality clear glass and durable. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: GEBrown

customer_reviews.title: Great for groups
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I had hoped for, but good for parties & larger wine tastings. Wide enough to get a nice swirl & bouquet. Use these mostly on our patio or for folks who (honestly) don't know any better.
customer_reviews.author: Dell S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds some good amounts of Wine
customer_reviews.text: Good item. These are thinner glass than expected but they can hold a good amount of wine.... and we all know that's a good thing!! :) We also hand wash these as I feel they could break in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: NOT Shatter resistant
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these specifically for the shatter resistance. Received them today and while rinsing, dropped one about 1/2" into the sink cushioned by running water. It shattered into many, many pieces!
customer_reviews.author: barnettdfw

customer_reviews.title: no more stemmed wine glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would drink wine out of anything but a stemmed glass. These stemless glasses are so elegant and I will never go back to stems. They are easy to hold and not easily tipped over. I haven't had them very long so I'm not sure about durability. I don't put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: MARSHA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition, no blemishes/cracks of any kind! I like how the rim has a raised, curved edge (not a sharp, blunt rim). Great customer service as I received a follow-up from the vendor confirming my satisfaction with the purchase. I ordered 2 sets because I loved them so much! (For a size reference, included is a picture of them next to a standard coffee mug.) Grateful for this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Glass has a foggy look to them.  I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses a few days ago. When I opened the box 3 of the 4 glasses were all foggy and thought oh well. Washed them 3 times by hand and dish washer and the glasses are still foggy. What I thought was from oily hands was actually in the glass itself. I wish I had kept the box to return them but I guess the will do for the short term.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like about them!
customer_reviews.text: I got them on Prime Day for a reasonable price. They are nice to hold in the hand and I now much prefer them to normal stemmed glasses. However I do doubt their claim that they are "virtually indestructible" since they don't seem to be any thicker that other glassware that I have. Time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Chippy

customer_reviews.title: Good Wine Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like these wine glasses. Just the right size. Have a quality look and feel. The price is right. Now I don't have to use the wife's expensive wine glasses for a casual glass of wine. Good glasses for cognac too!
customer_reviews.author: pooralan

customer_reviews.title: Great wineglasses!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has wanted stemless wineglasses for sometime so I finally purchased these for him. They are simple, basic stemless wineglasses and perfect for the price. We haven't had any close calls with breaking them (yet) so I can't comment on the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mermis

customer_reviews.title: Very thin.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a bind needed 4 more was super hard to clean kept being cloudy or like smudging. Lasted 1 dinner broke 1 glass just sitting on counter next to another glass I guess touched to hard very thin.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great...
customer_reviews.text: Wine glasses! My kids love to grab these when I am out of the room and have 'fancy drinks'. My were born glass breakers. These have held up! They look classy. Are affordable. And hold a lot of wine. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Dad

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses
customer_reviews.text: They came right on time and all in one piece because they were carefully packaged. I love them and they are very cute too. Arrived right on time for our little celebration.
customer_reviews.author: AprilRose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great wine glasses, just what I was looking for I wanted a glass it was not big and cumbersome and difficult to hold Noir. I want one too small where it was difficult to drink out of
customer_reviews.author: London O.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLASSES
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of these glasses, good weight. I do not have imperfections on the rims of my glasses as some others posted that they did. Packaged great! Good price.
customer_reviews.author: atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I have stemless Christmas glasses that I really liked so I bought these to use for every day. Came well wrapped and in a very nice box. Could easily be given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Librarian

product_meta.title: JoyJolt Spirits Stemless Wine Glasses for Red or White Wine (Set of 4)-15-Ounces
feature_bullets: CLASSIC WITH A TOUCH OF ELEGANT SOPHISTICATION: Impress your friends with these modern style JoyJolt red wine glasses curve to perfectly fit in your hand, and this stemless wine glass can be conveniently washed in the dishwasher.

DURABLE AND VERSATILE – This JoyJolt Spirits shatter-resistant wine glasses (not plastic) add a touch of elegance to your barware collection, table setting or party. Holds up to 15 ounces of red or white wine or your favorite beverage. They are ideal for serving wines and cocktails for casual entertainment and are durable enough for everyday use.

STEMLESS BASE FOR STABILITY: You no longer need to worry about the dainty wine stems! The broad base makes the glass tip resistance to prevent spills and sloshes and eliminates the risk of stem breakage common among traditional wine glasses. It features a bowl shape that enhances wine flavors and allows you to fully enjoy your glass to the last sip.

UNIQUE GIFT FOR THE WINE LOVER: Need a great gift for the wine lover in your life? This is the perfect wine glass set to give as a gift to the wine or home design enthusiast. They come in an attractive gift box and are terrific for Dinner, Parties, Wedding Gifts, Newlywed Gifts, Corporate Gifts, Father’s Day Gifts, Birthdays Gifts, Thank You Gifts, and Hostess Gifts.

DISHWASHER SAFE: These wine glasses are dishwasher safe without any fear of damage or breakage. 1-year satisfaction guarantee If they are damaged in any way upon arrival, we will send you a replacement set free of charge.
